dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: DIVINE JUDGMENT IS A LEGAL TRIAL

kernfrasen: wandered out to a terrible barren precipice
gone so far that he could not get back
no more time to turn around

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Time will fall exhausted at eternity's feet

cognitieve_implicaties: Time is a finite resource that has a limit.
theologische_implicaties: Eternity is superior and stationary compared to time.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Suggests God is outside of time in a way that might feel detached.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Highly poetic and evocative personification that re-activates the abstract concept of 'the end of time'.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher successfully bridges the Juridical domain (Judgment) with the Journey domain (Drifting away). The tension between God's mercy and judgment is managed through the metaphor of 'distance'—it is not that God stops loving, but that the person travels beyond the 'range of hearing'.

incoherentie_punten.metafoor_a: Worship as a Military Parade (Banners, Trumpets)
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The shift from triumphalist military imagery to intimate domestic discipline is jarring.

succesvolle_blending.locatie: The Thief on the Cross section
succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Sentence' (Legal) is the fixed context, while the 'Precipice' (Spatial) explains the internal state of the heart's receptivity to the 'Voice' (Relational).

sterktes.beschrijving: Uses the concrete, sensory story of the fruitcake to revitalize the dead metaphor of 'Judgment Day'.
sterktes.voorbeeld: I saw that rich, brown, luscious fruitcake... I knew judgment had come.

risicos.beschrijving: The use of 'peach tree switches' for divine judgment risks projecting child abuse or corporal punishment onto God's character.
risicos.voorbeeld: When she got through with him with the peach tree switches, he knew what judgment was.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregants with trauma may view God as a physical abuser rather than a holy judge.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The Cosmic Courtroom (The Great White Throne)
sub_worlds: The deathbed of the two thieves

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective at grounding abstract judgment in felt experience.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Repeatedly linking daily evaluations (work, school) to the final judgment.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Using the 'Mercy runs out' / 'Range of hearing' metaphor.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: GOD'S MERCY IS A SIGNAL (which can be lost if one moves too far away).

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits the 'Proclamation' and 'Call to Repentance' phases of a traditional service.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by Juridical and Journey metaphors. It effectively uses 'Spatial Distance' to explain the theological problem of the 'unpardonable sin' or the hardening of the heart. The preacher avoids the 'Economic' domain's coldness by grounding judgment in 'Relational' domestic stories.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Describe the texture of the pages or the ink—make the 'recording' process feel more sensory.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The ink that never fades, recording the whispers of the heart.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: God as Mother with a switch vs. God as the Silent Voice.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly state that the 'switch' is a human shadow of the 'natural consequences' of spiritual laws.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests sin is an external fog rather than a moral choice.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with 'Sin as Rebellion' to maintain agency.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To describe the 'Book of Life' as a foundation or a home being built, adding a sense of permanence.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using narrative to re-flesh abstract doctrine. The transition from the fruitcake to the Great White Throne is homiletical genius.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'rhythm' of the prose, CMT reveals how the 'Journey' metaphor actually solves the logical problem of a 'Merciful Judge'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's experiential learning cycle, CMT shows that the 'experience' of the fruitcake is not just a story but the cognitive scaffold for the hearer's entire theology of sin.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher views the 'Heart' as a 'Container' for 'Sensitivity' which can be 'Hardened' (Material change) or 'Emptied'.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Wandering out to a barren precipice
appendices.notities: The preacher is likely influenced by African American homiletical traditions, utilizing high-sensory narrative and rhythmic repetition.
